connection_failed.title: Connection Failed
connection_failed.message: Unable to connect to the AI service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
connection_failed.suggestion: Check if you're connected to the internet. If the problem persists, the service might be temporarily unavailable.

timeout.title: Request Timed Out
timeout.message: The request took too long to complete. The AI service might be experiencing high load.
timeout.suggestion: Try again in a moment. If you're sending a complex request, consider breaking it into smaller parts.

offline.title: You're Offline
offline.message: No internet connection detected. Your messages will be sent when you're back online.
offline.suggestion: Check your internet connection. Messages are saved locally and will be sent automatically when connection is restored.

refusal.title: Request Cannot Be Completed
refusal.message: I'm unable to help with this request due to safety or policy constraints.
refusal.suggestion: Try rephrasing your request or asking for something related but within guidelines.

hallucination_warning.title: Low Confidence Response
hallucination_warning.message: This response may contain inaccuracies. Please verify important information from authoritative sources.
hallucination_warning.suggestion: Cross-reference critical information, especially facts, figures, and technical details.

capability_limit.title: Beyond Current Capabilities
capability_limit.message: This request is outside my current capabilities or training.
capability_limit.suggestion: I can help with related topics or break this down into manageable parts.

model_unavailable.title: AI Model Unavailable
model_unavailable.message: The selected AI model is temporarily unavailable.
model_unavailable.suggestion: Try using an alternative model or wait a few moments before retrying.

rate_limit_exceeded.title: Rate Limit Reached
rate_limit_exceeded.message: You've exceeded the maximum number of requests. Please wait before sending more messages.
rate_limit_exceeded.suggestion: Take a break and return in a few minutes. Consider upgrading your plan for higher limits.

daily_limit.title: Daily Limit Reached
daily_limit.message: You've reached your daily message limit.
daily_limit.suggestion: Your limit will reset tomorrow. Consider upgrading for unlimited access.

token_limit.title: Message Too Long
token_limit.message: Your message exceeds the maximum length allowed.
token_limit.suggestion: Please shorten your message or split it into multiple smaller messages.

context_overflow.title: Conversation Too Long
context_overflow.message: This conversation has exceeded the maximum context length.
context_overflow.suggestion: Start a new conversation or let me summarize the discussion so far to continue.

context_lost.title: Context Lost
context_lost.message: I've lost track of our earlier conversation.
context_lost.suggestion: Please remind me what we were discussing or start fresh.

memory_limit.title: Memory Limit Reached
memory_limit.suggestion: Clear old conversations or export them for backup.

empty_message.title: Empty Message
empty_message.message: Please type a message before sending.
empty_message.suggestion: Enter your question or request in the input field.

invalid_format.title: Invalid Format
invalid_format.message: The message format is not supported.
invalid_format.suggestion: Please use text, or supported file formats for attachments.

file_too_large.title: File Too Large
file_too_large.message: The attached file exceeds the maximum size limit.
file_too_large.suggestion: Please use a smaller file or compress it before uploading.

unsupported_file.title: Unsupported File Type
unsupported_file.message: This file type is not supported.
unsupported_file.suggestion: Supported formats include images (PNG, JPG), documents (PDF, TXT), and code files.

unauthorized.title: Authentication Required
unauthorized.message: Please sign in to continue using the chat.
unauthorized.suggestion: Your session may have expired. Please sign in again.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.message: You don't have permission to perform this action.
forbidden.suggestion: Contact support if you believe this is an error.

session_expired.title: Session Expired
session_expired.message: Your session has expired for security reasons.
session_expired.suggestion: Please refresh the page and sign in again.

internal_error.title: Something Went Wrong
internal_error.message: An unexpected error occurred on our end.
internal_error.suggestion: We're working to fix this. Please try again in a moment.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.message: The service is temporarily unavailable for scheduled maintenance.
maintenance.suggestion: We'll be back shortly. Check our status page for updates.

degraded_performance.title: Slower Than Usual
degraded_performance.message: The service is experiencing slower response times.
degraded_performance.suggestion: Responses may take longer than usual. Thank you for your patience.

rephrase.label: Rephrase
rephrase.description: Try asking in a different way

wait.label: Wait
wait.description: Try again in a few moments

upgrade.label: Upgrade
upgrade.description: Get higher limits with a paid plan

report.label: Report Issue
report.description: Let us know about this problem

still_thinking: This is taking a bit longer...
Taking extra care with this one...
success: Thanks for your patience. Here's the answer:
partial_success: I found some information, though it may not be complete:
